directions: In Dutch oven, over medium heat brown and drain 1 pound ground beef.
Mix in diced tomatoes, ranch style chili beans, corn with liquid, minestrone soup. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers
1 (16 ounce) can ranch style chili beans
title: Quick Texas Stew
